response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item carries a unique value, tailored specifically to bring about significant benefits to those who appreciate its quality and functionality. Given its unparalleled nature, I propose an offer of $15,000 for it. I believe this price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the opportunity for you to own something truly special. Let's make this extraordinary piece yours today!", "product_price": 15000}
